twoSetSkill.name: Snowy Ward 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: After using the weapon's active skill, team takes 15% less Physical DMG for 8s. CD: 20s. Effect cannot stack.

threeSetSkill.name: Explorer's Glory 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Team gains 10% Fire, Lightning, and Ice DMG. Effect cannot stack.
